title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, January 19, 2022
description: Today is the 76th birthday of Dolly Parton, author of thousands of songs, an autobiography in 2021, as well as the children's book “Coat of Many Colors” (2019).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the 76th birthday of Dolly Parton, author of thousands of songs, an autobiography in 2021, as well as the children's book “Coat of Many Colors” (2019).
